R

refresh(PrintWriter) - Method in class ui.ZenTerminal
calls the refresh method in the simulator and writes the output of the simulator to the PrintWriter object
remove(int) - Method in class control.EventHandler
removes an event from the events list
remove(int) - Method in class model.poem.Bridge
removes a trip from the front of the queue
removeBlock(int) - Method in class control.Simulator
removes a specific block
reroute(Truck, Coord) - Method in class control.Simulator
reroutes a particular trip
rerouteAllHome() - Method in class control.Responder
returns all trips home
rerouteHome(String) - Method in class control.Responder
reroutes a particular trip to go home, by trip id
reset() - Method in class control.PoolBoy
resets the pools, to empty
reset(int) - Method in class control.Simulator
resets the simulator and all the pools and necessary objects
reset() - Method in class model.poem.QueueSim
resets all bridges, this method should be called on a simulator reset
resetPOE() - Method in class model.poem.TQConnection
This method is called on a reset, it resets all data for a session
Responder - Class in control
The responder is the way the system abstracts actions within the system, instead of having all actions have their own methods the responder has abstract simple actions that together may construct more complicated actions.
Responder(Simulator, List) - Constructor for class control.Responder
The only constructor for the responder, it holds references for the simulator and most of the data the simulator has access to
resume() - Method in class model.cargo.Truck
resumes movement if the truck was stopped
resumeAll() - Method in class control.Responder
resumes movement in all stopped trips
resumeAllTrucks() - Method in class control.Simulator
resumes movement in all trips
resumeTruck(int) - Method in class control.Responder
resumes a stopped trip by its trip id
resumeTruck(int) - Method in class control.Simulator
resumes movement in a particular trip
returnAllHome() - Method in class control.Simulator
returns all trips homes, rerouting them
returnHome(String) - Method in class control.Simulator
returns a particular trip home
Route - Class in model.traffic
The route class represents an expected route, it is basically an array of segments and methods to support it as a Route
Route(Segment[]) - Constructor for class model.traffic.Route
Builds a route with an array of segments
run() - Method in class control.Simulator
moves the tmie forward and runs the simulator according to the specified units per tick
run() - Method in class ui.SimControlTerminal
creates a new simulator and starts the main loop of the simulator
running - Static variable in class ui.ZenTerminal
